name: Scary Ladybug Miraculous
description:
Get ready for a Scary ladybug granny experience, a true Horror Game story. Escape the house

Scary ladybug miraculous mod horror lady for this Halloween ”Bob” is amazing way to spend time this Halloween day with your cat friend and get a scary time escaping the ghostly house!

You start in a room inside a haunted house, you have to find your way out to escape with the granny ladybug catching you; find hidden keys to unlock doors and solve math puzzles along the way in this horror cat lady house

Don't make so much noise or she will hear you and come find you! Be quiet and smart at the same time, use your surroundings in your advantage!
Hint you can hide inside boxes wardrobe and under tables to hide from the scary lady granny wearing a scary cat ladybug mask in this game.

You have a set of limited days to find a way to escape or else you fail and it's game over.

This game fits perfectly with the Halloween theme like cat and noir atmosphere of scary sounds and thrilled horror game play.

Miraculous Ladybug scary game mod features includes
- interactive environment, meaning you can use pretty much everything in the house like closets and shares tables and a lot more to hide and escape the lady house.
- horror gameplay.
- Easy to play.
- works like a puzzle game, and mind game to be more smarter than the lady bug in the house chasing you like a crazy cat lady.
- Scary sounds.
- High quality 3d graphics.
- New horror game for Halloween.
